name: Zombie Run (FlameStudios)
description:
After long time of waiting FlameStudios released "Zombie Run " on Google Play .

Run away from zombie Rick , but care he as an brother ...

Compare your stats with your friends and check who is the best in running away .

Tap on your player to move him , but dont run to fast ... or he will need time to breath ...

Care the Rick and his brother will get faster with time !
